body_html:
The error message isn't saying that the types don't match. It is saying that the Sub operator doesn't accept uint8 for either operand.

Add supports these types:

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc

Line 518 in 754048a

"T: {half, float, double, uint8, int8, int16, int32, int64, complex64, "

Sub supports these:

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc

Line 529 in 754048a

.BINARY_FEWER()

I believe that this is the intended behavior (though I don't know exactly why Sub doesn't support this type @josh11b Do you know why this is the case?)
body_text:
The error message isn't saying that the types don't match.  It is saying that the Sub operator doesn't accept uint8 for either operand.
Add supports these types: 
  
    
      tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc
    
    
         Line 518
      in
      754048a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           "T: {half, float, double, uint8, int8, int16, int32, int64, complex64, " 
        
    
  


Sub supports these:

  
    
      tensorflow/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc
    
    
         Line 529
      in
      754048a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           .BINARY_FEWER() 
        
    
  


I believe that this is the intended behavior (though I don't know exactly why Sub doesn't support this type  @josh11b Do you know why this is the case?)
body:
The error message isn't saying that the types don't match.  It is saying that the Sub operator doesn't accept uint8 for either operand.

Add supports these types: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/754048a0453a04a761e112ae5d99c149eb9910dd/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc#L518
Sub supports these:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/754048a0453a04a761e112ae5d99c149eb9910dd/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc#L529

I believe that this is the intended behavior (though I don't know exactly why Sub doesn't support this type  @josh11b Do you know why this is the case?)
